title: Chores log
description: Each entry the status on an assigned chore.

calendar_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date the chore was planned or attempted .

timestamp.description: HH:MM:SS formatted time of the chore was planned or attempted.

location_id.description: location where chore was carried out.

person_id.description: the person who carried out the chore.

min_per_day.description: the minimum chores person carries out per day.

avg_per_day.description: the average chores person carries out per day.

max_per_day.description: the maximum chores person carries out per day.
